mapper.sql: icon_id, type, os, seq, name, subtitle, pic, activity, ios_activity, icon_url, key1, value1, key2, value2, key3, value3, status, create_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from icon
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into icon (type, os, seq, name, subtitle, pic, activity, ios_activity, icon_url, key1, value1, key2, value2, key3, value3, status, create_time) values (#{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{os,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iosActivity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iconUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{key1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{key2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{key3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
